Text:
Hi there!
Great quality DVD series this is. But why oh why is the speed soooooo low? I just don't understand. All other torrents download like crazy and these ones go at snail speed. There appear to be enough seeders and leechers... In the meanwhile I have uploaded myself 12 Gb for just this one disc but got stuck at 84% for several days already. Please fix this if possible. 
Thanks in advance.
